name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On June 15, it was reported that Cheng Yuan, the initiator of the https://t.co/GoY2mp6462 project, was sentenced to five years in prison and deprived of political rights for five years for the crime of subverting the state power.
"Programmer's struggle"
It is reported that on March 27, 2019, a project called 996ICU was uploaded on GitHub. On the domain page pointed to by this project, the initiator Cheng Yuan wrote: "What is
He compared the minimum 72 working hours under the 996 work system with the provisions of the Labor Contract Law and called for "Developers' lives matter".
This project was subsequently supported by a large number of programmers, causing the public to pay attention to the work health issues of the programmer group. It was defined as "a rebellion of programmers."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full text of the court judgment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The abscess under the grand narrative" - Sohu News poster collection
Recently, Sohu News produced a series of posters based on authoritative data released by the State Council, the National Bureau of Statistics, the National Development and Reform Commission, the Supreme People's Procuratorate and other institutions to convey the serious problems facing Chinese society today.
These national data, like the speech of former Premier Li Keqiang in May 2020, once again pulled people back to the reality from the grand narrative.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Correction: Cheng Yuan's wife said that Cheng Yuan was not the initiator of 996icu, but the producer of the subsidiary sections 996action and 996law.
https://t.co/mIw9nvDvKb

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the afternoon of June 16, at Chebei intersection in Tianhe District, Guangzhou.
When pedestrians were waiting for the traffic light, a white car directly hit them, killing one person and injuring three others.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
June 15, Zhuzhou, Hunan. The video shows that at a bend, a traffic policeman pushed a man on a motorcycle down the slope when he intercepted him.
The local response said: We will investigate and verify.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 15, Beijing Workers' Stadium, a long thank you list before the game
Among them, the host especially thanked the National Immigration Administration, saying "You all know, it's not easy for Messi to come, right?"
When the host thanked the Chinese Football Association, the whole audience cheered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 16, latest news:
The teenager Di who rushed into the stadium to hug Messi last night was detained and ordered not to enter the stadium to watch similar games within 12 months.
Di apologized for his behavior and accepted the punishment from the public security organs.
